comment.author: 24710122@N03
comment._content: colors look a little bit artificial...then again...i am not an expert on vintage photo techniques...

comment.author: 32045990@N07
comment._content: You're right.  It's a chromolithograph..basically photomechanical version of a black and white photo with color added, the whole process done with a printing press.

comment.author: 53012263@N00
comment._content: I assume it's a post card off of a printing press.

comment.author: 24715065@N02
comment._content: The notes on the photo are in English, but I cannot figure out from what country those soldiers come. The NY news wire reference certainly does not mean much, because those are not American...at least, no uniforms I have ever seen. Some of them look similar to the next shot (earlier), and those are British, I am guessing.
